Package com.topcoder.message.email

Class Summary
EmailEngine The EmailEngine class is responsible for sending email.
EmailEngine.AttachmentDataSource AttachmentDataSource class implements DataSource to be wrapped with a DataHandler for the creation of MimeBodyPart instances to add into the Multipart instance that make up the body of the MimeMessage.
PriorityLevel Type Safe Enumeration of the values that priority can be.
TCSEmailMessage The TCSEmailMessage class represents a single email message.
 

Exception Summary
AddressException Custom exception to encapsulate errors related to invalid addresses and invalid address types.
SendingException Exception class to encapsulate all errors that occur over the network or with (present or missing) foreign hosts and with the connection and sending methods of the javamail API.
